dict.acceptation: 刑罚，惩罚；严厉对待；<口>给吃苦头；

sent.orig: The parole originating from capitalistic punishment system is an important way of enforcement of punishment.
sent.trans: 假释制度是近代资产阶级刑罚制度的产物，是一项重要的行刑制度。

sent.orig: He is under security punishment or disciplinary punishment that has not been executed or finished yet.
sent.trans: 二受保安处分或感训处分之裁判确定，尚未执行或执行未毕者。

sent.orig: The tendency of mitigation of punishment is the world trend of punishment now.
sent.trans: 刑罚趋轻和轻刑化是世界刑罚发展的趋势。

sent.orig: Criminal elements who voluntarily surrender may be given a lesser punishment or a mitigated punishment.
sent.trans: 对于自首的犯罪分子，可以从轻或者减轻处罚。

sent.orig: An accomplice shall be given a lighter or mitigated punishment or be exempted from punishment.
sent.trans: 对于从犯，应当从轻、减轻处罚或者免除处罚。
